alert.note: Alert for Keith; Lincoln; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 6:59PM CDT until April 13 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Keith County in southwestern Nebraska... Northwestern Lincoln County in southwestern Nebraska... Southwestern McPherson County in west central Nebraska... * Until 745 PM CDT/645 PM MDT/. * At 658 PM CDT/558 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sarben, or 24 miles east of Ogallala, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sutherland, Paxton, Sarben, Sutherland Reservoir State Recreation Area, Coker and O`Fallons. This includes the following highways... Highway 97 between mile markers 18 and 19. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 142 and 160. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
